item.description: Route53 #aws #cloud #dns #networking A DNS solution by AWS. Route53 is a DNS similar to Godaddy or Namecheap. • You can migrate from another DNS provider and can import records • You can migrate a hosted zone to another AWS account • You can migrate from Route 53 to another registrar • You can also associate a Route 53 hosted zone with a VPC in another account to Authorize association with VPC in the second account.
